elements.label: #PREVIOUSCHARACTERNAME#, our Shaper
elements.description: The one who raised us; the one who made us what we are; the one who waits in exile, and will rise when we bring the Dawn.
elements.comments: Is an acquaintance so we can hijack the cult foundation recipe.

elements.label: A Favoured Place
elements.description: For so long I waited at the left hand of our Shaper. Now the time has come for me to lead the Great Work.

elements.label: Shaper's Guidance
elements.description: We will need our Shaper's guidance to forge the Dawnbreaker Core from a Carcass Spark; to refine Forge ingredients to their final form; to make of a follower the Shaper's Compass; to learn of the Key from the Ligeian, Sulochana; and to complete the Work. But if we do not do their bidding swiftly, Dread will follow.

elements.label: Dawnbreaker Technique
elements.description: THE SHAPER SPEAKS: 'I must enact the Forge. Set a Carcass Spark at the engine's heart. Awaken it with the highest mysteries. Prepare the fiercest alchemy to fuel it. Find the flaw in the place at the land's edge that has the same name in every History. Bring the device there, with the Biting Key that Sulochana the Ligeian knows. Evoke the Forge's greatest heat; employ the most potent Mysteries of Opening; and I will attend your dissolution.'

elements.label: Dormant Dawnbreaker Core
elements.description: A shining cage of curved metal, enclosing a softly glowing fragment of ancient light. It might begin our Dawn, if we can rekindle it and purify it with the fiercest alchemy.

elements.label: Dawnbreaker Core
elements.description: A radiant cage of curved metal, imprisoning a blazing mote of solar fire. If we can carry it to the place where the world's flaw colours the air, we can bring the Dawn.

elements.label: Blue Gold
elements.description: This is alchemy's savage summit: the deadly blue of fire outpacing light. Touch it and die.

elements.label: Mrs E.'s Assistance
elements.description: A little brass chimaera-head given by Mrs E. as a token. When we have prepared the proper rite, she'll bear her Key to the flaw in the world, so that when I bring the Dawn, the Mansus will open for our Shaper. But she won't wait forever.

elements.label: Sabotaged Dormant Dawnbreaker Core
elements.description: A battered tangle of bent metal, enclosing a mote of drunkenly bobbing light. We must repair it before it collapses altogether!

elements.label: Sabotaged Dawnbreaker Core
elements.description: A flaring tangle of bent metal. A blazing mote of solar fire quivers fitfully within. We must repair it before it collapses altogether!

elements.label: Unstable Blue Gold
elements.description: A poisoned, stuttering ingot of energetic alchemy. We must soothe its rage, and quickly!

elements.label: #PREVIOUSCHARACTERNAME#, our Delight
elements.description: Our fountain, our joy, who rests in exile until the greatest of Feasts, the Vitulation.
elements.comments: Is an acquaintance so we can hijack the cult foundation recipe.

elements.label: Duty and Delight
elements.description: Our Delight saved me from death, and also from boredom. We shall give them everything.

elements.label: Delightful Blood
elements.description: I have received a little vial of our Delight's blood, via courier. Our Delight's instructions are written herein, in the tiny tangles of cellular script. We can taste them, as they will taste us. If we waste it, our Delight will wax wroth.

elements.label: Vitulation Recipe
elements.description: 'The Delight shall give life; the Delight shall take life; the Delight shall not be sated. We must purchase the secret savours and infuse them with the Hours' gifts; assemble the Host; at the most auspicious time, raise the resistless cry of the Unceasing Mysteries and share from the Chalice Murmurous.'

elements.label: Forlorn Blood
elements.description: I have a disease. My blood is wrong. My bones are sick. I'll die. But perhaps I can preserve myself, long enough, with the holy blood of our Delight.

elements.label: Savorous Blood
elements.description: I am of the same blood as the Delightful, now. As long as their savour graces my veins, my disease cannot touch me. Without their blessing, I'll die.

elements.label: The Seven Graces
elements.description: The Spices and Savouries department of the eccentric firm of T.R.N. Ltd caters to endeavours such as ours. They have supplied these tempting adornments, with which we shall bedizen and prepare ourselves... once they have been correctly prepared in a sealed and darkened kitchen.

elements.label: The First Fragments of the Host
elements.description: We have attracted a few gourmands and perverts. They will expect a feast of the senses.

elements.label: The Second Fragments of the Host
elements.description: Word spreads. Curiosity and appetite will drive strangers to attend our Vitulation.

elements.label: The Third Fragments of the Host
elements.description: Filthy draggles of the morbid and the inquisitive.

elements.label: The Fourth Fragments of the Host
elements.description: The hungry, the greedy, the curious: all these have received our invitation.

elements.label: The Fifth Fragments of the Host
elements.description: Now the name of the Vitulation is whispered wherever mouths embrace meat.

elements.label: The Sixth Fragments of the Host
elements.description: When the time comes, our guests will throng like rats.

elements.label: The Host, Assembled
elements.description: We await only the Key-holder, who must open the Kingskin Gate when our Delight enacts the Grail.

elements.label: The Host and the Guests
elements.description: When the signal is given, a great Host will assemble, their eyes so wide - their mouths so wide - to feast and be feasted upon - to draw from me the blood of our Delight. Our very Delight shall lead them in their feasting, and the Lady of Wires shall turn her Key.

elements.label: #PREVIOUSCHARACTERNAME#, our Illuminated One
elements.description: Our source, our inspiration, who dwells now in the Mansus.
elements.comments: Is an acquaintance so we can hijack the cult foundation recipe.

elements.label: The First Dream
elements.description: The dreams have hollowed me out like a withered oak, and now I am almost ready.

elements.label: A Dream of a Key
elements.description: The dream, again. Instructions for me, and for someone else, if I can find them. It will guide me into the Mansus. It will show me what I need to do. It is a presentiment of the true Key, for those who know something of the Glory.

elements.label: The Third Mode
elements.description: 'We shall navigate; we shall illuminate; we shall not be compassionate. Seek the Crossroads behind the Door of Eyes. Raise there the Allure. Send the silvered dead to bring the sleeping souls of mortals. When there are sufficient Witnesses, send for the Key of Days, to open the three-lobed gate Outwards, in its third mode.'

elements.label: The Lesser Crossroads
elements.description: A pair of knotted roads beneath the shadow of a tree, and the eye of the Tricuspid Gate, close to the head of the Ascent of Knives. The Concursum's shadow? Its reflection? Its sister?

elements.label: The Allure
elements.description: Once seen, the Allure clings. Few living souls will ever venture this far into the Mansus. I must employ a Maid-in-the-Mirror and show her the Allure, so that she will know to bring them here.

elements.label: The Witnesses: One of Seven
elements.description: A solitary figure, swaying at the Crossroads in the golden light of the Allure, the blue of the Mansus.

elements.label: The Witnesses: Two of Seven
elements.description: A Witness-pair, swaying at the Crossroads in the golden light of the Allure, the blue of the Mansus.

elements.label: The Witnesses: Three of Seven
elements.description: Their faces are blanker than ever, but they have taken each others' hands.

elements.label: The Witnesses: Four of Seven
elements.description: The light bleaches them, but by their nature they will dapple as the moment draws near.

elements.label: The Witnesses: Five of Seven
elements.description: Five witnesses wait for the fruit that will swell, but never ripen.

elements.label: The Witnesses: Six of Seven
elements.description: The air is agony. They cannot look away.

elements.label: The Cloud of Witnesses
elements.description: Seven silent souls softly supplicate shining source.
